author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Always have a 'Plan C”
author: Zoltan Andrejkovics

quote: “Coming to the END of MYSELF and all SELF effort...seems to be the very point that God steps in and shows HIMSELF to be more than ENOUGH.”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Recovery is full of ups and downs.There is no such thing as a linear life.But you can always turn your setbacks into setups to come back stronger.”
author: Brittany Burgunder

quote: “I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming.”
author: Courtney Love

quote: “A story meant to motivate all and sundry irrespective of their circumstances”
author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: “Choice forms the divider which is responsible for the formation of all futures that can be possible.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “On the other hand, if the future is not the one you chose then you may have to use your willpower to obtain the future of your liking.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Most people know the physical senses, but a lot of people don’t know the soul’s senses: empathy, trust, intuition, love and harmony”
author: Steven Aitchison

quote: “Forgive to forget, do not forget to forgive”
author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: “It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If the world is a book, are you the hero, or just a walk-on part?”
author: K.J. Parker

quote: “When life's got you down, keep your head up... you can't see the ground anyway”
author: Nicole  Rae

quote: “A cord that remains, always. in many ways...”
author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: “It's better to do something with quality, no matter how long it takes you rather than do something mediocre, with constant quantity.”
author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quote: “Today is a special day that will go by very fast, so let’s take every second to make the most out of every moment.”
author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quote: “The smell of the sweat is not sweet, but the fruit of the sweat is very sweet.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Yawns are not the only infectious things out there besides germs.Giggles can spread from person to person.So can blushing.But maybe the most powerful infectious thing is the act of speaking the truth.”
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: “If the fire in your heart is strong enough, it will burn away any obstacles that come your way.”
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: “You’re only responsible for yourself, Jess. And that’s the only person you can control. Other people will either get it or they won’t but you can’t define yourself by their opinions.”
author: Susan Mallery

quote: “How we relate with other people is dependent on how we rate ourselves and what we think about ourselves.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Always make your future bigger than your past.”
author: Dan Sullivan

quote: “Taking the decision-making process away from people disempowers them. It also makes them much less likely to buy into the decision, however right it may be. One’s own conscience remains the ultimate arbiter.”
author: Lama Surya Das

quote: “Father has a strengthening character like the sun and mother has a soothing temper like the moon.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Some of the most powerful speeches I have given have been delivered in the dedicated silence of my actions.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Five years from today, you will be the same person that you are today, except for the books you read and the people you meet.”
author: Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

quote: “Our own self-esteem is something we can actually twist in whatever way we want.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “I don't give up. That makes me incredibly resilient or maybe stupid or just plain stubborn. Whichever...”
author: Destiny Booze

quote: “Without adversity, there would be no growth, and without growth, there would be no lesson to be learned.”
author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “One of the Secrets in Life is to Make Stepping Stones out of Stumbling Blocks.”
author: Jack Penn

quote: “There is no real world, just the one you create.”
author: Jolene Stockman

quote: “Leaders in OVER their heads is the mere result of getting ahead of their intended SEASON.”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “The word "seek" is a verb. Are you treating it as such in your life? If you seek change, success, or love, DO it - BE it!”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “How would your life be different if...you had a plan of action towards your goals? Let today be the day...You stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You do not become outstanding by working on your weaknesses.You become outstanding by focusing entirely on your strengths.”
author: Gordana Biernat

quote: “A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.”
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: “The whole world's a canvas for our sketchesHorizons as far as the mind stretchesA work of art with soft edgesWaiting to come aliveNow's the time”
author: Marie Helen Abramyan

quote: “Your only limitations are the ties you allow to bind you.”
author: Saundra Dalton-Smith

quote: “If I quit now, I will soon be back to where I started. And when I started I was desperately wishing to be where I am now.”
author: Anonymous

quote: “Do I wither up and disappear, or do I make the best of my time left?"-Morrie”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “The lion never fears to walk alone.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “What is done is done for the love of it- or not really done at all.”
author: Robert Frost

quote: “Your core, lying deep within you, is what makes you what you are. Some call it the soul, the Higher Self, the true self, the being and so on. The name is unimportant once you realize that you are more than your looks and outward appearance.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.”
author: Steve Pavlina

quote: “POEMINHA DO CONTRATodos estes que aí estãoAtravancando o meu caminho,Eles passarão.Eu passarinho!”
author: Mario Quintana

quote: “If someone does not consider those around them to be valuable and hold only themselves in high regard, they too have a very bad self-esteem.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Stop allowing your outdated ideas to hinder your progress. How would your life be different if you became open to new information that can refine, improve, enhance your way of thinking, and empower your way of living?”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Pure happiness and peace are at their peak when your body is in harmony with itself.”
author: Asa Don Brown

quote: “Every minute doing one thing is a minute not doing something else. Every choice is another choice not made another path grown over lost.”
author: Jerry Weintraub

quote: “If we can acquire an attitude of self-belief, then we will surely determine our future actions and our future life opportunities.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Life seems to be fashioned and formed best out of the obstacles that seem unbearable.”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Jedi are always assessing situations, actions and possibilities. Jedi don’t just think outside of the box with the help from the Force, they also adapt to situations outside of the box!”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Jedi are conversationalists and negotiators, bringing people together and solving problems. Jedi listen and feel to what others are saying.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “The gratitude that you feel leads to faith in the abundance and with every resonance that radiates from your mind more strong feelings of faith start to reside in you.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “There are two kinds of leaders, cowboys and Shepherds. Cowboys drive and Shepherds lead.”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “I have not learned a single lesson, been inspired or impacted by another person’s life void of negative experiences.”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Humans, unlike Jedi, are powerfully afraid of rejection. We do not survive well alone, so humans as a species are especially vulnerable to thoughts that make us afraid the rest of the “tribe” will desert us to die a sad, lonely death.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “It's not about what I SEE for our future, or humanity; It's about what I DO for our future and humanity.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Small thinking and big dreams is an oxymoron”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “The real architect of a life is the hard and almost impossible circumstances one faces.”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “How would your life be different if...You didn’t wait for someone else to fix a problem or social issue? Let today be the day...You take up a cause that you feel in your heart and give your time and efforts towards that cause.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Failing to make it to the list of the best 5 students in class or not being named the team captain should not make anyone feel like they have failed.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “Tap into ‘The Force’ and soon, at any given time that you need that extra shot of high octane confidence; you will soon be like a Jedi Master at this technique.”
author: Stephen Richards

quote: “For young adults,the growth from silly to serious can be very fast, indeed.”
author: Dean Cumings

quote: “You can'tstop dreamingjust becausethe night neverseems toend.”
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: “If you can show people how to build castles, make sure you do not neglect building and nurturing your own.”
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: “Get off the treadmill of consumption, replication, and mediocrity. Begin lifting the weights of creativity, originality, and success.”
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: “It's the days you have every right to breakdown and fall apart, yet choose to show up anyway that matter most. Don't diminish the small steps that others can't see.”
author: Brittany Burgunder

quote: “Momentum builds success.”
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: “Mixing old wine with new wine is stupidity, but mixing old wisdom with new wisdom is maturity.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “The decision is your own voice, an opinion is the echo of someone else's voice.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Like everything else, we know the futility of money only when we have more than enough of it.”
author: R. N. Prasher

quote: “If you can't impress them with your argument, impress them with your actions.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Nothing is permanent in my mysterious world, even my moments of belief - Jenifer”
author: Durgesh Satpathy

quote: “The Sun never sets. It is we who rise think to shine. ”
author: Earle Birney

quote: “Where do they go, these dreams of mine? Do they live? Do they die? Do they fall? Do they fly?”
author: F.K. Preston

quote: “Best Way to Stay Happy is to be busy.”
author: Dipika Agarwal

quote: “If you believe ,you can."But work hard to believe".”
author: Divyansh Mishra DM

quote: “We don't have to take our personality so personally.”
author: Wes Nisker

quote: “Self -pity is the worst form of poison. It kills a person without the person realizing it ~ Aarush Kashyap”
author: Kirtida Gautam

quote: “Don't let him take who you are. Make him fear who you'll become.”
author: Mary Weber

quote: “To become, you must first believe.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “You're going to find the people that make it work NEVER quit, quitting is NOT an option.”
author: Bob Proctor

quote: “Every single ONE of us is a unique VIBRATION in a beautiful Symphony of Infinite CREATION.”
author: Gordana Biernat

quote: “You and your reality are ONE. When YOU change, everything changes.”
author: Gordana Biernat

quote: “Success is not a question of how much power or money you have acquired. It is a question of how satisfied you are with WHO YOU ARE.”
author: Gordana Biernat

quote: “I'm not talented at all. It's just that I spend more time thinking about art than others.”
author: Tsubasa Yamaguchi

quote: “Live Life Fully & Abundantly”
author: Gabbriella Conte

quote: “When YOU choose to change, your reality must change accordingly. It simply has no other choice.”
author: Gordana Biernat

quote: “How far can your imagination take you? I don't know. That's up to you, but I think you should find out.”
author: Destiny Booze

quote: “Never think twice, when you have decided once.”
author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quote: “You have tried to be superior in an ordinary realm. Now you must learn to be ordinary in a superior realm.”
author: Dan Millman

quote: “It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.”
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: “The most unlucky generation is the one which couldn't produce a hero to look upto.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Acceptance makes an incredible fertile soil for the seeds of change.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “A life without regret can be attained by full awareness of one's actions in their present moment.”
author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “Instead of bracing yourself for the perils of the unknown, embrace the joy that is here, in your present moment.”
author: Michelle D. Rosado

quote: “Athletes who are able to stay completely focused in pursuit of their dreams are the ones that are most likely to become champions.”
author: Steve Backley

quote: “I m human, I m not perfect. Although, I make mistakes all the time.”
author: Chetan bhagat

quote: “Spirituality is for people. It’s not just for those who you might have read about in books, it’s for people.”

quote: “There is a thin line between the impossible and the possible - that is determination.”

quote: “If you ever feel helpless... go and help someone. Yes, you! Just go...”
author: Lasse Pedersen

quote: “Da giovane è facile credere che ciò che desideri sia ciò che ti meriti, è facile convincersi che se davvero vuoi qualcosa, è tuo sacrosanto diritto ottenerla.”
author: Krakauer Jon

quote: “Time is always new, for dreams to come trueDestiny is yours, to do what you do Change is different, but only for awhileFree will it always, brings in a whole new styleCompetition makes, the fight all worth your while”
author: Marie Helen Abramyan

quote: “If I considered other people's mediocre standards a sufficient metric by which to measure my own accomplishments, I'd have never amounted to anything.”
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: “Listen up: just because you have the capacity to do something for someone, it doesn't mean you have the obligation to especially when they won't even appreciate you for doing it”
author: Xiran Jay Zhao

quote: “You can do anything if you put your mind into it”
author: Jeremy Mcgilvery

quote: “..your ambition is your beauty,”
author: Ramita

quote: “Don't live on the comments of people but on the truths of God.”
author: Todd Stocker

quote: “When you focus on solving the big problems of this world, you will eventually find big solutions for those problems.”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “Where you find the end is the real beginning.”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “Sometimes you start early and finish later, it does not mean that you have taken more time, it means that you experienced much more than others.”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “Focus on one thing and be blind for everything else so that the whole world can see you shining.”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “How do you cultivate optimism? By learning the secret of contentment. If you can learn that, then no matter what happens to you, you can weather the storm and build on the good you find in any situation.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “Behind every triumph there's a thousand tragedies.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Having both normal eyes doesn't necessarily mean ability to see. There are so many individuals with both normal eyes, such powerful potential to see... But they can't see anything.”
author: Tshepo Ramodisa

quote: “If you have not done something to improve a human's life in some way, you have not truly lived.”
author: Dr. k. Bharathi

quote: “Each day is meant to edify you and equip you with the necessary tools for you to reach your destiny.”
author: Brendon Thutso

quote: “As a working rule, no matter what language you are learning, you can assume that the language will have some way of expressing the meaning that you want to communicate. The trick, of course, is to find out how.”
author: Chris Lonsdale

quote: “You can change your Future by changing your mindset”
author: Jeremy Mcgilvery

quote: “The fastest way to get to easy is through hard.”
author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quote: “Ordinary people will make sure that you too think ordinary.”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Success is the best Revenge.”
author: Juwel Chowdhury

quote: “Tough as thunder, sweet as honey, that's the motto for a braveheart human.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Our visa for the planet earth has a validity of just 100 years. It can expire early, but an extension is unlikely.”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “What drives your buying decisions - necessities, comforts, pleasures, status, or ego?”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Why do we want to be present in many worlds at the same time? Just choose to live in the moment; it’s the most straightforward recipe for happiness.”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Find your friends, because life is too short to spend with enemies.”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Spark exists for a moment and then turns into ash. How is human life different?”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Any new life skill is worthy learning as you do not have an idea when it will make a big difference.”
author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

quote: “When someone tells me "no," it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them.”
author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

quote: “Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses.Focus on your character, not your reputation.Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When all is said and done, more is said than done.”
author: Lou Holtz

quote: “Get going. Move forward. Aim High. Plan a takeoff. Don't just sit on the runway and hope someone will come along and push the airplane. It simply won't happen. Change your attitude and gain some altitude. Believe me, you'll love it up here.”
author: Donald Trump

quote: “You'll never get ahead of anyone as long as you try to get even with him.”
author: Lou Holtz

quote: “Live your truth. Express your love. Share your enthusiasm. Take action towards your dreams. Walk your talk. Dance and sing to your music. Embrace your blessings. Make today worth remembering.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You're never as good as everyone tells you when you win, and you're never as bad as they say when you lose.”
author: Lou Holtz

quote: “All men want, not something to do with, but something to do, or rather something to be.”
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: “You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.”
author: Henry Ford

quote: “Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?”
author: che guevara

quote: “In the name of the Pizza Lord. Charge!”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “Hope in the shadow of fear is the world's most powerful motivator.”
author: Neal Shusterman

quote: “The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance. The wise grows it under his feet.”
author: James Oppenheim

quote: “Love is forgiving, accepting, moving on, embracing, and all encompassing. And if you’re not doing that for yourself, you cannot do that with anyone else.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.”
author: Dr Roopleen

quote: “Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.”
author: Bohdi Sanders

quote: “You are a divine being. You matter, you count. You come from realms of unimaginable power and light, and you will return to those realms.”
author: Terence McKenna

quote: “Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “When you're following your inner voice, doors tend to eventually open for you, even if they mostly slam at first.”
author: Kelly Cutrone

quote: “Rise and rise again until lambs become lions”
author: Robin Hood

quote: “But one of the worst results of being a slave and being forced to do things is that when there is no one to force you any more you find you have almost lost the power of forcing yourself.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself. Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “To progress in life, I don’t focus on how much I have done but on how much I have yet to do.”
author: Idowu Koyenikan

quote: “It's not that some people have willpower and some don't... It's that some people are ready to change and others are not.”
author: James Gordon

quote: “Many times in life, we are held back from achieving our goals because we do not commit ourselves wholeheartedly. With an escape route in mind, we hold ourselves back from giving our all.”
author: idowu koyenikan

quote: “Your inner strength is your outer foundation”
author: Allan Rufus

quote: “I just want to be someone, to mean something to anyone...”
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: “Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You have the power to heal your life, and you need to know that. We think so often that we are helpless, but we're not. We always have the power of our minds...Claim and consciously use your power.”
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: “Would you like to know your future?If your answer is yes, think again. Not knowing is the greatest life motivator.So enjoy, endure, survive each moment as it comes to you in its proper sequence -- a surprise.”
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The quality of a man's life is in direct proportion to his commitment to excellence, regardless of his chosen field of endeavor.”
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: “You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you’re faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you’ll overcome it. Yes, you can.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will”
author: Jack Welch

quote: “Where did we ever get the crazy idea that in order to make children do better, first we have to make them feel worse? Think of the last time you felt humiliated or treated unfairly. Did you feel like cooperating or doing better?”
author: Jane Nelsen

quote: “We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Our Age of Anxiety is, in great part, the result of trying to do today’s jobs with yesterday’s tools!”
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: “Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.”
author: Lou Holtz

quote: “I said "Somebody should do something about that." Then I realized I am somebody.”
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: “The road to success is always under construction”
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: “Your talent determines what you can do. Your motivation determines how much you are willing to do. Your attitude determines how well you do it.”
author: Lou Holtz

quote: “Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all.”
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: “The voice says, maybe you don't go to hell for the things you do. Maybe you go to hell for the things you don't do. The things you don't finish.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “Life's short. Live passionately.”
author: Marc A. Pitman

quote: “Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.”
author: Mario Andretti

quote: “Do it badly; do it slowly; do it fearfully; do it any way you have to, but do it.”
author: Steve Chandler

quote: “A challenge only becomes an obstacle when you bow to it.”
author: Ray A. Davis

quote: “I am so grateful for my troubles. As I reflect back on my life, I have come to realize that my greatest triumphs have been born of my greatest troubles.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Writer’s block results from too much head. Cut off your head. Pegasus, poetry, was born of Medusa when her head was cut off. You have to be reckless when writing. Be as crazy as your conscience allows.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “If we judge ourselves only by our aspirations and everyone else only their conduct we shall soon reach a very false conclusion.”
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: “Talent is a wonderful thing, but it won't carry a quitter. ”
author: Stephen King

quote: “When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.”
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quote: “It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.”
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: “There is no more compelling motivation to worthwhile endeavor than the knowledge that we are children of God, that God expects us to do something with our lives, and that He will give us help when help is sought.”
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: “Never pray to be a better slave when God is trying to get you out of your situation.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “When you live your life by poor standards, you inflict damage on everyone who crosses your path, especially those you love.”
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: “It’s hard to believe there are people that don’t read books. There’s so much magic in words and well told stories.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Follow your bliss and doors will open where there were no doors before.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “Never run from the enemy, tackle them”
author: Victoria Addino

quote: “Get immersed in the beauty that surrounds you. No filters, edits, or adjustments. Experience the colors, sounds, textures and smells within your reach. Live.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would.”
author: Tehmina Durrani

quote: “Dear me, one day I'll make you proud.”
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: “Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long. Remember, success is something you experience when you act accordingly.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “It is only in our darkest hours that we may discover the true strength of the brilliant light within ourselves that can never, ever, be dimmed.”
author: Doe Zantamata

quote: “No one asks how to motivate a baby. A baby naturally explores everything it can get at, unless restraining forces have already been at work. And this tendency doesn't die out, it's wiped out.”
author: B.F. Skinner

quote: “Be more than motivated, be more than driven, become literally obsessed to the point where people think you're fucking nuts.”
author: David Goggins

quote: “The truly terrible thing is that everybody has their reasons.”
author: Jean Renoir

quote: “When you stop living your life based on what others think of you real life begins. At that moment, you will finally see the door of self acceptance opened.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Do not sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities.”
author: Rodolfo Costa

quote: “You don't go walking into the proverbial lion's den lightly. You start with a good breakfast.”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “I need to stop getting into situations where all my options are potentially bad.”
author: Jack Campbell

quote: “Live Long and Prosper”
author: Leonard Nimoy

quote: “How to win in life:1 work hard 2 complain less 3 listen more 4 try, learn, grow5 don't let people tell you it cant be done6 make no excuses”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “No one wakes up in the morning and says, 'I want to gain 150 pounds and I will start right now!”
author: Tricia Cunningham

quote: “Stop searching the world for treasure, the real treasure is in yourself.”
author: Pablo

quote: “Motivation is the fuel, necessary to keep the human engine running.”
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “Anything which is physically possible can always be made financially possible; money is a bugaboo of small minds.”
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: “Everybody wants to be a bodybuilder, but nobody wants to lift no heavy-ass weights.”
author: Ronnie Coleman

quote: “If reading makes you happy, do it. Whatever makes your heart sing and brings you joy, do that too.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Sustain joy by anchoring yourself with gratitude.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Remember to celebrate the small accomplishments along your journey because they will provide the support needed when the road gets rocky. ”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Imagination is not bound by possibilities. The creative mind will always break the shackles—making the impossible, possible.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “We love being mentally strong, but we hate situations that allow us to put our mental strength to good use.”
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: “Life’s too short to walk around with your arms crossed and bottom lip poked out. Find a way to smile for yourself even if it’s as simple as licking the spoon clean or putting clean sheets on your bed.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Writers create impressions that inspire, stir emotions, evoke questions and sprinkle seeds of awe.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Writers have influenced thoughts, principals, viewpoints and experiences throughout history. A talented writer’s pen is anointed with magic!”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “We all grow tired eventually; it happens to everyone. Even the sun, at the close of the year, is no longer a morning person.”
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: “You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Curiosity is the engine of achievement.”
author: Ken Robinson

quote: “Motivation comes from working on things we care about. It also comes from working with people we care about.”
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: “Go as far as you can see and you will see further.”
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “I put on the boots and kicked some monster ass.”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “Focus on what you are and what you can rather than what others aren't & can't. You have to win; they don't necessarily have to lose for you!”
author: Alok Mishra

quote: “I can’t think of anything more disheartening than living a life without a clear purpose.”
author: Daniel Willey

quote: “You touch some of the reasons for my going, not for my staying away.”
author: Charles Dickens

quote: “Keep creating: the world yearns to celebrate your next masterpiece.”
author: Ken Poirot

quote: “It’s not just the big moments that count, it’s all of the small actions that feed our heart and soul on a daily basis. Cherish those moments and reflect on how to replicate them often.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Patience is the only way you can endure the gray periods.”
author: Teri Hatcher

quote: “He had made himself believe that he was going to get well, which was really more than half the battle.”
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quote: “The hardest part of any important task is getting started on it in the first place. Once you actually begin work on a valuable task, you seem to be naturally motivated to continue.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “The war to preserve the privilege of mythmaking”
author: Marvin Bell

quote: “Motivation is when your dreams put on work clothes”
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: “Don't be afraid to be afraid. Have fear, and then conquer the shit out of it.”
author: D. Antoinette Foy

quote: “If life didn’t give you at least one person not wanting you to succeed then half of us would lose are motivation to climb that cliff, in order to prove them wrong.”
author: Shannon Alder

quote: “Today is the day you choose to find joy, fulfillment and the path that will make your heart sing. It's your choice, never lose sight of that.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Nothing is born into this world without labor.”
author: Rob Liano

quote: “If only we had the certainty in our strength that we do in our weaknesses and capacity for failure - oh how wonderful life would be”
author: Daniel Mangena

quote: “While intent is the seed of manifestation, action is the water that nourishes the seed. Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Imagine a place where everyone chooses to bring energy, passion, and a positive attitude every day.”
author: Stephen C. Lundin

quote: “Money is like gasoline during a road trip. You don’t want to run out of gas on your trip, but you’re not doing a tour of gas stations.”
author: Tim O'Reilly

quote: “A life fueled by passions is like riding on the back of a dragon.”
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: “If you're reading this, I hope God opens incredible doors for your life this year. Greatness is upon you. You must believe it though.”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “Spend more time doing things that make you forget about the time.”
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: “Most people who decide to grow personally find their first mentors in the pages of books.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “Life is complicated. If life was simple, wouldn’t that make us simpletons?”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “What makes the engine go?Desire, desire, desire.”
author: Stanley Kunitz

quote: “Blessings! Count them and be thankful. Ask for an abundance of them and accept with gratitude.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Tapi... karena nggak tahu apa-apa itulah, esok hari jadi sesuatu yang layak ditunggu, kan?”
author: Windhy Puspitadewi

quote: “Fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge. Only Fools despise wisdom and discipline." Proverbs 1:7 NLT”
author: Eddie  Johnson

quote: “Motivation will keep you going forwards, Hesitation will only drag you backwards.”
author: Mouloud Benzadi

quote: “Habits stay with you even when you don’t have the motivation.”
author: Neeraj Agnihotri

quote: “People who work in an environment where doing their best is recognized have a better chance of feeling good about their work.”
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: “When we pray we admit defeat.”
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: “The good men of every age are those who go to the roots of the old thoughts and bear fruit with them.”
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: “Motivation gets you going and habit gets you there.”
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “The heights charm us, but the steps do not; with the mountain in our view we love to walk the plains.”
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: “A professional is one who does his best work when he feels the least like working.”
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: “Rejection is a challenge.”
author: Veronica Purcell

quote: “If you don't write when you don't have time for it, you won't write when you do have time for it.”
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: “Everything you need is already within you. The beauty of life is that your DESTINY lies always in your hands. The time has come for you to STEP UP and BE GREAT”
author: Pablo

quote: “but I have no mind for business and considered staying awake to be enough of an accomplishment.”
author: David Sedaris

quote: “Live with Fulfillment, Serve with Passion so in this Lifetime you will have the ablility to Die with NO Regrets.”
author: Randy Gonzales

quote: “If you practice hard, you can win every battle.”
author: Manny Pacquiao

quote: “Faithfulness in small things leads to faithfulness in great things, and never the other way around.”
author: Pastor Jerry L. Lewis

quote: “Diversity of character is due to the unequal time given to values. Only through each other will we see the importance of the qualities we lack and our unfinished soul's potential.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Act as if it was, and it will be.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Introspection is a form of self-management. You reflect. You decide. You change. You allow yourself to grow.”
author: Raoul Davis Jr.

quote: “motivating people, forcing them to your will, gives you a cynical attitude toward humanity. It degrades everything it touches.”
author: Frank Herbert

quote: “Virtually everyone needs motivation of some sort, but when you are in love - that is motivation enough, it turns many into poets and painters, it spurs the creativity in you.”
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: “No matter how smart we may think we are, no matter how committed we are to our truth, we can lose our way.”
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: “It still holds true that man is most uniquely human when he turns obstacles into opportunities.”
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: “The greatest win is walking away and choosing not to engage in drama and toxic energy at all.”
author: Lalah Delia

quote: “The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you’ll be in all areas of life.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When you experience a negative circumstance or event, do not dwell on it. Be proactive — put your attention on what you need to do to bring the situation to a positive result.”
author: Rodolfo Costa

quote: “The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Where there is life, there is hope.”
author: Alyson Noel

quote: “I have moments that aren't too bad, but there's always something I'm struggling with, or feeling guilty about. I just figured I needed to try harder, but I find it difficult to sustain that motivation.”
author: William P. Young

quote: “I often lose motivation, but it's something I accept as normal.”
author: Bill Rodgers

quote: “Recognize that throughout this beautiful day,you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “...she doesn't have to choose between being gentle or being fierce. Both exist in nature and both exist in her. That's ok. She'll know to nourish them both and when applicable, use each unapologetically.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Faith keeps our ships moving, while empathy and the memories of our experiences lead to wisdom.”
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: “While others were dreaming about it - I was getting it done.”
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: “MANAGE YOUR MOOD: Name 1 thing that surprised you today...Name 1 thing that moved you...Name 1 thing that inspired you...”
author: Gino Norris

quote: “Believe in yourself. Under-confidence leads to a self-fulfilling prophecy that you are not good enough for your work.”
author: Dr Roopleen

quote: “If I didn't have Lincoln's butt to stare at the whole time, motivation would be a lot harder to come by.”
author: Jessica Shirvington

quote: “Walk free from the long shadows cast by small people.”
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: “Every adversity brings new experiences and new lessons.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “GIVING - Applied tithing is so rewarding. When you give away your time, talent, and treasures you create a huge shift in your prosperity consciousness. So start where you are as you reach for where it is you want to be.”
author: Lisa Washington

quote: “If you want to be happy, you need to set your mind on happiness.”
author: Ana Kostovska

quote: “It is great to do what you love but greater with the great team.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “There are people who are waiting to be motivated by you.”
author: Neeraj Agnihotri

quote: “When our commitment is wavering, the best way to stay on track is to consider the progress we've already made. As we recognize what we've invested and attained, it seems like a waste to give up, and our confidence and commitment surge.”
author: Adam M. Grant

quote: “The universe doesn't give you what you want in your mind; it gives you what you demand with your actions.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Pain los[es] its power when other things bec[o]me more important.”
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: “To turn your dreams into reality, all your resources, efforts and concentration should be aligned in the same direction.”
author: Dr Roopleen

quote: “Every game is winnable if you change your mind about what the prize should be and your perspective about the players at the table.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Dream your dream; and realize that you are more than just the dreamer, you are the point of origin for its reality.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The only walls that exist are those you have placed in your mind. And whatever obstacles you conceive, exist only because you have forgotten what you have already achieved.”
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: “Inspiration fires you up; motivation keeps you burning.”
author: Stuart Aken

quote: “If you don't make the time to work on creating the life you want, you're eventually going to be forced to spend a LOT of time dealing with a life you don't want.”
author: Kevin Ngo

quote: “Music is the beat of a drum that keeps time with our emotions.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Now he was proving it again. Each time was a new time and he never thought about the past when he was doing it.”
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: “Perfection is not a destination; it's a never-ending process...Enjoy!”
author: Jim Bouchard

quote: “Cream always rises to the top...so do good leaders".”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration,motivation, and a pinch of creativity”
author: bo bennett

quote: “When you SEE into the invisible, you will DARE to do the impossible!”
author: John Paul Warren

quote: “Pain doesn't last. And when it's gone, we have something to show for it. Growth.”
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: “Take each day in your open palms and close your fists around it. This life is not done with you yet.”
author: D. Antoinette Foy

quote: “You can motivate by fear, and you can motivate by reward. But both those methods are only temporary. The only lasting thing is self motivation.”
author: Homer Rice

quote: “The world is a terrifying place, more than I ever realized. But if I had my whole life to do over again, that's literally the only thing I'd change. I'd stop being so afraid of other people.”
author: Brian K. Vaughan

quote: “Let your playerhaters be your motivators.”
author: Alberta Parish

quote: “If there was a reason why he preferred the liberal tendency to the conservative one (also held to by many of his circle), it was not because he found the liberal tendency more sensible, but it more closely suited his manner of life.”
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: “Fear is a powerful stimulant.”
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: “It's not life situations but our thoughts are the pilots of grief.”
author: Durgesh Satpathy

quote: “Urusan pembaca adalah mengekalkan ingatan pada apa yang mereka sukai. Sebaliknya, urusan penulis adalah menghapus ingatan dari apa-apa yang sudah ia bikin. Ia hanya memusatkan perhatian pada bagaimana melahirkan karya sebaik-baiknya saat ini.”
author: Laksana  A.S.

quote: “People who don't smile are not serious”
author: Dhillon Lee MW

quote: “Today is the day you have to start believing in yourself. No one can do it for you anymore.”
author: Lauren Graham "Someday Someday Maybe"

quote: “Do not be afraid of what should be afraid of you”
author: Constance Friday

quote: “Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game!”
author: Babe Ruth

quote: “Greatness and nearsightedness are incompatible. Meaningful achievement depends on lifting one's sights and pushing toward the horizon.”

quote: “When nothing goes right, you have to face forward and take it on head first.”

quote: “Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts.”

quote: “Competition is a rude yet effective motivation.”

quote: “If life throws you a few bad notes or vibrations, don't let them interrupt or alter your song.”

quote: “If your arteries are good, eat more ice cream. If they are bad, drink more red wine. Proceed thusly.”

quote: “Others can't always define your true identity. They see what they 'want' to see but beyond your mess, God sees the beauty He created and still thinks it's good!”

quote: “Do you know where your breakthrough begins? Your breakthrough begins where your excuses ends.”

quote: “Perserverance: Outlasting the most rash, pessimistic, cowardly naysayers; those first in line to deny us the dreams never tried. Ourselves.”

quote: “I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday, I have today and I know Him who holds tomorrow so I know tomorrow will be beautiful for me.”

quote: “God can take the ordinary and create the extraordinary. Our incredible God has the power to transform your simple life and give you the life of your dreams. Remarkable things happen in your life when you believe.”

quote: “...one cannot but wonder how an environment can make people despair and sit idle and then, by changing the conditions, one can transform the same people into matchless performers.”
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: “The ability to stay calm and focused in the midst of change is what distinguishes great leaders from those just collecting a paycheck.”

quote: “Whilst some people inspire, others conspire!”

quote: “Serendipity is not the product of patience; it’s the product of action.”

quote: “Following your convictions means you must be willing to face criticism from those who lack the same courage to do what is right. It’s called the road less traveled.”

quote: “Nobody is going to save you but yourself and the ‘best’ and only way to do so isthrough action.”

quote: “The privileges of the Nobles of the Sword are not democratic ... Across the country, peasants have been burning crops and châteaux. If the King does not willingly change taxation, I fear commoners and peasants will force him.”

quote: “Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.”

quote: “Do you wait for things to happen, or do you make them happen yourself? I believe in writing your own story.”

quote: “To realize one's destiny is a person's only real obligation and when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.”

quote: “It may take little time to get where you want to be, but if you pause and think for a moment, you will notice that you are no longer where you were. Do not stop—keep going.”

quote: “Money is just an idea.”

quote: “Someone needs to fight, someone needs to sacrifice, someone needs to inspire, someone needs to be a hero.”

quote: “It is not so much where my motivation comes from but rather how it manages to survive.”

quote: “I challenge you to make your life the masterpiece you want to paint, the novel you want to read, the day you want to wake to.”

quote: “Love' is the only weapon I have, I will defend with love, I will attack with love.”

quote: “Vainglory, however, no matter how much medieval Christianity insisted it was a sin, is a motor of mankind, no more eradicable than sex.”

quote: “The Rest of Our Life Is Going To Be The Best of Our Life!”

quote: “we tend to steer our lives in the direction of the lessons we need to learn”

quote: “Where would we have been without the discoveries of our predecessors, and where are we going without your discoveries?”

quote: “Start even if you don't know how.”

quote: “The choice to make good choices is the best choice you can choose. Fail to make that choice and on most choices you will lose.”

quote: “Don't be in a hurry. Everything arise in the due time.”

quote: “I refuse to live life with unsettled differences”.”

quote: “Whatever you think you are, you are always bigger than that...”

quote: “I’m always scared to death that I won’t do a role justice. But fear can be a great motivator.”

quote: “If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.”

quote: “The IMPOSSIBLE is ONLY relevant to those who NEVER attempt it...otherwise it is ABSTACT and MEANINGLESS”

quote: “Seek first the kingdom of heaven WITHIN, whereby lies an abundance of treasures and resources that you need”

quote: “I was determined to move forward.”

quote: “Motivation gets you going; Inspiration keeps you going.”

quote: “What have you gained since you haven't prayed? What will you lose if you pray?”

quote: “If you are willing to be a self-learner, you will develop yourself.”

quote: “I made it greater,you always told me to forget the haters.”

quote: “Vladimir, be reasonable, you haven't yet tried everything. And I resumed the struggle.”

quote: “Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The Sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus”
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: “Convince yourself everyday that you are worthy of a good life. Let go of stress, breathe. Stay positive, all is well.”

quote: “The water doesn't know how old you are.”

quote: “the worst thing said about him is that he was "uncurious.”

quote: “May you find the strength of will and the grace of endurance to overcome every challenge.”

quote: “Every cruelty is a form of weakness.”

quote: “Self determination is greatest will power.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Today is a gift that will be taken from you at day's end. Don't waste a moment, a chance, a lesson. You'll never live today again.”

quote: “If you want him to do it, you've got to change the picture of the world inside his head.”

quote: “Achieving success is a challenge but so is struggling so you may as well choose success. ”

quote: “It doesn't matter where you've been, only where you are going.”

quote: “Our ancestors have invented, we can at least innovate.”

quote: “Raise the bar higher than your opinion...”

quote: “Ish #211 "Your child is your parental obligation, not friend.”

quote: “If you say no to oppurtunity, you had said no to life”
author: Leonardo Theoson

quote: “Ambivalence is one of the biggest enemies of change. If you aren't sure that you really want to take action on something such as your weight, ambivalence will usually win.”

quote: “Tidak ada seorang pun yang bisa dikalahkan, sampai dia menyerah--DI DALAM PIKIRANNYA SENDIRI!”

quote: “ Inevitably, if we are to grow and change as adults, we must gradually learn to confront the challenges, paradoxes, problems and painful reality of an insecure world.”

quote: “I was going to buy a copy of The Power of Positive Thinking, and then I thought: What the hell good would that do?”

quote: “To be cruel is to be coward.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Yeu only live once.No matter what yeu choose to do with it, it should be worth it.”
author: Sandesh Hukpachongbang

quote: “Berani tanpa disertai kesabaran akan membunuh anda.Ambisius tanpa kesabaran dapat memusnahkan karier yang paling menjanjikan.Berjuang meraih harta tanpa kesabaran akan mengamblaskan milik yang sudah ada.”

quote: “The seeds you planted last year will grow in this year. Think hard on that when you plant again.”

quote: “When you fall don’t get up until you figure out what tripped you.”

quote: “Just like how countless stars did, always in the same spot you will shine brightly on your own.”

quote: “Until you believe you can do it, it's going to be difficult to convince anyone else you can do it.”

quote: “Neatness and cleanliness is not a function of how rich or poor you are but that of mentality and principle.”

quote: “You are an artist and the masterpiece is your life.”

quote: “You don't get time.You create time.”

quote: “There would be a time, when you will ask for nothing but life.”

quote: “Let your past propel you forward, not hold you back.”

quote: “Civilization is a myth. That is the truth this world has taught us. We have not risen above our baser instincts... That is what always has and always will drive us.”

quote: “Inspiration moves one from Pessimism to Optimism, from Doubt to Faith, from Despair to Hope, and from Darkness to Light!- RVM”

quote: “Apunta a la luna y si fallas, al menos estaras entre las estrellas.”

quote: “You are thunder and lightning Love and rageIntensity and sensitivity Made of mountains, oceansFire and fierce thingsDreams and curiosityYou are paradoxes and contradictions Some days soft, some daysStrong as fuck Always beautiful.”
author: Melody  Lee

quote: “At times what you expect and what happens don’t match. The faster you accept and adapt to what happened & work towards creating what you believed, that what you expected gets created in a whole new way..!”

quote: “Reputation Is Temporary..As Much as The Man Owning Your Reputation Is”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “WINNER:is A Runner who “Wins Inspite Of Ninety Nine ExcellentRunners!”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Leadership is all about caring, daring and sharing!Caring for people, Daring to Act fearlessly,& Sharing the success with all!”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Once You keep Aside the Emotional side Of yours,Is when You stop using the phrase “This was a BAD PHASE” of life..”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “A focused Mind is a result Of a little Effort To tell Your Distractions To sleep for A couple of hours While you are at WORK.”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “All have dreams, live for them, They add meaning to LIFE.The only thing that differentiates us from other beings is the fact that us can DREAM!!!”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “What You were Once, Was Also Because You Were Someone Else Before that”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Have a GOAL to keep the following 5-‘H’ OUT of your lifeH – HarassH – HamperH – HurtH – HarmH – HinderTo Ensure H=Happiness Prevails forever!”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Take a discovery walk today to find what's missing in your life. There's peace in the whisper of the wind, hope in the sun smiling from behind clouds, strength in every step forward. You can do it!”

quote: “The Glory Is Always Hidden Between The Lines Of the Story”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “When every minute of your day is planned & you are packed for days, you shall soon realize that the pain of past fades, vision of life gets clearer and all that seemed to poison your life Ceases to exist.”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Even in hardship, God’s goodness prevails.”
author: Todd Stocker

quote: “IT’s All In The Game Of Mind.”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “The 4 pillars Of the Greatest Religion ever Are Love Trust Character & Brotherhood...”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “The wisdom of LIFE eludes even the best...For those who pass the test Life is a fest,While, its forever, A battle for the rest..”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Action is traction.”
author: Rob Liano

quote: “Don’t believe negative voices. Listen to the divine-instinct of awaken soul.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “The greatest obsession is I believe in myself.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Great achievement requires personal force, determined spirit and self-confidence.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “You have to conquer every obstacle, before you can reach the top of the mountain.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “You will encounter many challenges in life. But you must never be defeated by the challenges.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “May you find the courage to rise above any circumstance.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Living a daring life is zealous pursuit.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Never allow anyone or anything to demise or dull your truest identity. Hurtful words and harsh judgments have no impact when your north star, your guiding light, shines from the center of your chest and beats from your own truest heart.”
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: “Control leads to compliance; autonomy leads to engagement.”
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: “Forget perfect on the first try. In the face of frustration, your best tool is a few deep breaths, and remembering that you can do anything once you've practed two hundred times.”

quote: “Did I love what I was doing, or did I love myself in doing it?”
author: C. Terry Warner

quote: “It's hard to stay committed when our heart isn't in it.”
author: Deborah Day

quote: “Goal Of LIFE Is patience,Goal Of Patience Is LIFE!”

quote: “If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in the dark with a mosquito!”
author: Wolfgang Reiber

quote: “When you feel down and out you must reach up and out--to Spirit! Our strength will only resonate deep within your souls if you open your heart and minds with us.”
author: Jim Fargiano

quote: “Things get done only if the data we gather can inform and inspire those in a position to make difference.”
author: Mike Schmoker

quote: “Things that aren't important, that have nothing to do with winning and losing, don't have to be a rule.”

quote: “If you’ve got a dozen pitchers, you need to speak 12 different languages.”
author: Michael Lewis

quote: “He who perseveres like an infant that falls down and keeps getting up, shall eventually find the way.”~ Amunhotep El Bey”
author: Amunhotep El Bey

quote: “Follow Your Heart & The world Shall Follow YOU!Reject it and It stops beating!”
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: “Without the desire to be patient patience doesn't happen, Just like without the desire to grow, LIFE doesn't happen!”

quote: “It is the very use of coercion, positive or negative, that breaks or deadens the spirit, which is the source of motivation.”

quote: “Trust not in Sprites nor the motivations of a Gnome.”

quote: “We need something that encourages us to work, we need an intimate aid. This is only possible through meditation.”

quote: “An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.”

quote: “Ish #28 "Give you child a name with meaning.”
author: Regina Griffin

quote: “Ish #177 "You never know what you don't know, until you finally know it.”
author: Regina Griffin

quote: “If you accept working for 'peanuts' don't complain when you're treated like a monkey.”
author: Rob Liano

quote: “I've never considered the possibility of defeat. I've never planned for it. That's the job for those people who plan for such things. My job is to only plan for success...victory; it has my complete focus.”

quote: “Seeking Your face and not only Your hand, I find You embracing me just as I am.”

quote: “The struggle is the canvas upon which our character is painted.”

quote: “Within every struggle lies an opportunity for resilience, growth, and personal evolution.”

quote: “Don't let fear of failure hold you back. Embrace it as a stepping stone towards success.”

quote: “Embrace the unknown, for it is where true growth and transformation happen.”
