quote: “The splendour of life is often experienced after you have overcome the challenges in your path.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Things may not be going well in your life, but you are still alive. That is all that matters. Look for every opportunity possible to find happiness in your path.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “This is life, figure out what needs to be done and do it right; that is how you live a fruitful life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “This is your only chance to give life your best shot. Do not miss it at all!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “This life does not have a best friend. It only has voyagers who travel from their date of birth until their date of death.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Watching drama play out from afar could seem fun, but it can be very sad if it is in your life. Avoid any form of drama and stay away from those who fuel it with their lies.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Whatever you do, do it right. If it comes back to you later in life, you will be glad you did what was right.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When life seems hard, work hard to overcome those hardships. Yes, it may take a while for the breakthroughs to come to pass, but when you do what you must and do it right, one day you will be super proud.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When the right people walk into your life, the right things start to happen.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you are surrounded by those who make life easy, you will enjoy it. But in the company of those who complicate things, life will not be easy.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you compete with others in life, you miss the chance to complete your own race with grace.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you feel all alone and in the dark, never give up. When the time is right, life will grant you great rewards.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you rewrite the story of your life, make sure the new chapters are better than the old ones.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you rewrite the story of your life, make sure the new chapters are much better than the old ones.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Work hard now so that in the evening of your life, you can still enjoy the sunrise.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You know you have mastered the art of life when you refuse to be the one who points fingers, and decide to be the one who helps find the right answers.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Your life is your business. Take care of it and treat it like serious business. Do not get too involved in other people’s businesses and neglect yours in the process.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It takes some time to succeed in life because true success is not just about the money, but also about the great lessons learned on the path to success.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Identify your top three goals and demolish the number one obstacle. Stay laser-focused and fiercely determined on your objective, and success will be yours for the taking.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Whether you want to double down on previous successes, address significant challenges, or embark on new endeavors, identify your top three goals.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Don’t wait for success to find you. Identify the skills and knowledge you need, pursue them relentlessly, and watch as you surpass your wildest dreams.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Don’t let unfinished business weigh you down. Finish what you started and unlock the door to limitless possibilities.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Reflect on the impact you make each day. Ask yourself, if someone replaced you today, what would they bring? Strive for excellence, build your skills, and own your success.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Time is the fuel of life. Use it wisely, prioritize your tasks, and unlock your full potential.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Transform your life, one habit at a time. Develop daily practices that align with your goals, stay consistent, and become unstoppable.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Obstacles are opportunities in disguise. Stay motivated, stay productive, and hold yourself accountable for your success. With every challenge, you grow stronger and closer to your goals.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “In the depths of struggle, we discover the true strength that resides within us.”
author: Pep Talk Radio

quote: “The struggle you face today is the strength you will carry tomorrow.”
author: Pep Talk Radio

quote: “Make it your sole intention to be part of the solution. When you learn how to efficiently solve problems, you will attract many opportunities.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In life, some questions do not require you to get answers from outside. They need you to search on the inside.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In recent years, it has become increasingly difficult to digest some situations because of people who make assumptions about life's conditions based solely on screenshots, oblivious to what occurred before those screenshots.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is hard to define life entirely, but what I know about life is that it will give you a chance to define yourself. So do your level best to put yourself out there.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is okay not to be okay when things are not okay in your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is significant to look after yourself and your significant others. In the process, do away with the insignificant things in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is vital to be useful in life because when you do not use your gifts, you become useless.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Learn to allow some chapters in your life to close so you can start new, beautiful chapters.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Learn to prohibit anything that hinders your progress in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a one-way trip with no return ticket. Always remember that you are in transit.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Never desire someone else’s life. You have no clue what they have been through. You may also not fully understand what they are going through.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The essence of life is to live it, not as a competition but as a race. In this race, you can crawl, walk, or run the best way you deem fit, as long as you are moving forward.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Never let the tragedies of life transform you into a human tragedy.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No amount of wealth is worth your life. Never sell your soul in exchange for a fat cheque. Remember that you can only enjoy that wealth when you are alive.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No matter the difficulties you face, do not be a difficult person. Choose to make life easy for others.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Not everything will make sense in life; that does not mean you should accept nonsense.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “One act of kindness can change or even save someone's life. Be kind to yourself and others!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Precious moments with precious people can help you realize how precious life can be.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Save your life. Stay away from people who do not like to see you smile.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Self-evaluation helps you identify areas that need attention in your life. So, make time to learn more about who you are.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Shortcuts can cut your life short. Avoid them at all costs.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Showing some people, the door when their time in your life is up is not a crime; it is a proactive stance to save your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Some things will feel too good to be true, but never feel bad about them because you also deserve good things in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Heart, brain and backbone,if you have these three,you have everything to succeed.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Sometimes life will make you smile, and other times it will make you frown. Life has its ups and downs. Yours is to make every day count.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes life will require that you walk a million miles. Do it, no matter how hard it becomes. One day, you will look back and be proud that you were able to do that.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes people will come into your life asking for your help, only for them to put you in a mess. Help yourself by all means; do not allow anyone’s mess to leave you in distress.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes the more you do good, the more tragedies you will experience in life, but you can sleep well at night knowing you have done your best to help others.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The quality of your thoughts determines how far you can go in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you do your due diligence to make a difference, you will live a life of elegance.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You can make a difference even with your silence. Life is not always about making unnecessary noise. What matters is what you do to make a difference.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Appreciate the lessons brought to you by the courtesy of life. Some came through sweat and blood, but significant for your path.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you can endure the process and look back with a clear thought process, you will realize that some of life's best lessons came from a place where you were rejected.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In your life, there are things you never expected yet they happened. That is because they needed to happen for you to learn some necessary lessons.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Learn to be open-minded. Master the right lessons and do not ignore the red flags, for they can hinder your progress.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a mandatory school for the living. Everyone is a learner because every day, life offers mandatory lessons.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life offers many free lessons, but most people would rather pay the heavy price of ignorance because they cannot pay attention to the subtle lessons of life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always teach you good lessons and if you are a good learner, you will become wiser.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “What distinguishes the wise from the unwise is their ability to embrace life’s distinctive lessons.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Know who you are; it will help you live a good life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life comes once. Live wisely.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a one-way road with no reverse option, so live it with caution and avoid any commotion.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a temporary trip through this world, so do not live as if you are a permanent resident.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is easy when you live among people who do not make things difficult for you.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is precious. Live your own life, love it and look after it.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always have highs and lows. Learn to live triumphantly, no matter what happens.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will offer you a unique experience, so ensure you live each day without fear, doubt, or regret.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The best way to live a better life is to do your best while you still have breath.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Time will keep moving even after your life comes to an end. So, make sure you live well and leave a legacy that can outlast your time on earth.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “As the grass withers with time, so does life fade away. That is why you need to make an impact while you still have a chance.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “At every level of your life, you need to take a step forward, or else you will remain the same and be left behind.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Be ready to adjust in life because it can get bumpy at any time.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “A combination of minutes makes one’s lifetime. Make sure that none of those counts as wasted time.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Even if life had happened the way you wanted, you would still be disgruntled because it is not what happens that makes you content but how you choose to react.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Even if you admire someone else’s life, do not desire it, for you do not know what they have gone through.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Even if you have the best mentors, you still have to go out and do the work. No one can do life on your behalf.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Fixate your eyes on things that can fix your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Harsh words spoken to you must not depict the end of your dreams. Use those words to energize you into doing something great. In life, champions are those who are not afraid to fly high, regardless of any attempt to pull them down.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you can understand the basics of life, you are better than a person who complicates even the easiest things.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you want success in your life, do not focus on what others are doing. Instead, focus on what you should be doing.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is not always easy to go through life. Sometimes stuff happens and you face hard times, but you do not have to be hard on yourself. You can still do your best and become a great success.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Success in one area of life and failure in another can affect your stance on success. Aim to succeed in the key areas of life so you will not feel like a failure.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Your success in life will depend on whether or not you are willing to persevere and follow the necessary processes until you get there.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you value your time, do not entertain anything that does not edify your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you want a valuable life, ensure that whosoever is part of your inner circle protects your peace of mind and adds value in their own right.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life can never be a dress rehearsal. It is real. Value your time and put no value on people or things that add no value to your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Look around. You will never find another person with your exact kind of life. Your path is unique. So, make sure that your thoughts, convictions and values enable you to add value.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No matter what happens in life, never underestimate your own value.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Value your life. You have been given a rare chance to live; remember that no one else can have that life but you.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You should not deny yourself a profitable life by associating with people who add no value.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Your life is more valuable than all the precious stones in this world. Realize your own value and do something of value.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Beyond today, no one knows how life will turn out. So, while you can, celebrate the special moments.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Capture the best moments in life, and overlook the bad ones. Learn to celebrate life while you still have time.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Celebrate the present moment and never dwell on what happened in the past if you want to enjoy life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Celebrate your life and remember that you were given a chance that many aborted babies were denied.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Do not get it twisted. Life will always have twists and turns. One way or another, your turn to celebrate or cry will come. Either way, live a joyful life!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is not easy to forget those who touched your life in a special way. It is good to celebrate life’s heroes while they are still alive. Choose to appreciate the good things they have done.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a beautiful journey filled with discoveries every single day. So, as you go through each day, find ways to celebrate life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The most important thing in life is not to be a celebrity. It is to be able to celebrate life regardless of your status in society.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Be good to yourself and others. When you do that, you will be able to make a difference in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you want to make a difference in life, do not be terrified of change. It will position you in a higher dimension.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is amazing, but its amazing wonders are hard to realize when others become atrocious. Wherever you are, choose to be good, do good, and make a difference.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will present you with different people, things and places. What matters is what you do with them in order to make a difference.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Make a meaningful difference in someone’s life. It is of paramount importance to them and you as well.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Not everyone was given a chance to be alive today. So, find happiness, enjoy your life and make a difference.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Things may get hard sometimes, but the most important thing is to make a difference in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Those who know why they are on earth do not mind making a difference in life because they know what others do not know–purpose.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In life, it is wise to acknowledge that you do not know certain things. After all, no one knows everything.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In this life, do not take things lightly all the time. Have the wisdom to discern when things are serious.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life offers various lessons, but it is your choice to take them or leave them. If you take those lessons, you will make your way into the world of wisdom.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life requires both discernment and wisdom because some people come to help solve problems, while others come to create more problems. Discernment will help you know them, and wisdom will help you know how to deal with them.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Look for the lessons life presents, because through them you can gain the knowledge and wisdom to live well.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Many situations in life will make you wise if you learn to glean wisdom from the littlest things.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you embrace wisdom, it refines and redefines who you are in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Wisdom is the ability to close your eyes and open your mouth to ask God about His plans for your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Your life will take better shape if you are willing to find wisdom and have the courage to climb the highest mountains.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Do not sit back and let people make key plans on your behalf. Wake up and stand up for your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “How far you will go in life depends on how far you are willing to learn, plan and implement the good lessons you have learned.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In this life, if you want to be in a league of your own, learn and plan to be your own cheerleader until you become a champion.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is wise to plan effectively and do what is required in order to live a fruitful life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always throw different situations at you, no matter who you are or where you are, but there is comfort in knowing that no situation will last forever. No matter how hard it gets, plan to overcome and there will always be a way out.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Never give up on yourself, no matter what happens in life. When you follow God's plans for your life, one day you will be fine.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No matter how hard life is for you right now, never attempt to take your own life. Give life another chance. Have better plans for the remaining years you have and you will be amazed by how far you get.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Plan in advance to avoid unnecessary headaches in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Some delays are meant to preserve your life. So do not be weary when things do not go according to your plan.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes people will not comprehend your plans. Go ahead and implement them if God is on your side because in life, not everything you do will make sense to others.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When things fall apart after you have done your best, it does not mean you are a failure. Cherish your life, and let no one make you feel inferior. It only means things did not go according to plan, but you can still do better.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life was designed to be neither painful nor pain-free. You have to journey through it, irrespective of the pain or pleasures along the way.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Even if you have been through a painful past, do not dwell on that. What matters is that you are still alive. Bank on that and make your life count.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will not always be pain-free. But as painful as it can sometimes be, being alive can also be pleasing.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes, painful circumstances will find their way into your life. Be prepared for them and find ways to overcome them!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You will inevitably go through pain. Do not let it take your life down the drain. Do something of value, regardless of the pain and focus on the things you can still gain.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Success in life is possible if you allow yourself to learn, dare to be different and make a difference in the world.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you always think of ways to succeed, you will find ways to succeed. In life, everything begins with how you think.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you want a life of success, you should be ready to make the necessary sacrifices.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes life will put you through tough times. Choose not to give up until you overcome.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you choose to capture the best moments in life, life becomes a beautiful adventure.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You are only presented with one life, and you can either choose to make it better or worse. Choose wisely!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You may not have everything right now, but you can choose to make something out of your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “From time to time, life will present you with an opportunity to make your mark. Learn to discern and choose to be different. It is when you do the things that help you stand out that you will be able to shine your light.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Change is imminent in life because yesterday will never be the same as today or tomorrow. So be ready to handle each day as it comes.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Depend not on human beings because they change time and again. People who were once close can become estranged. That is the strange thing about life, it changes right in front of your eyes.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Do not beat yourself up about the things you cannot change. It will make your life difficult. Take heart and take charge of what you need to change.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Find yourself in the right spaces, go places and make the necessary changes. Life is not only about where you have been. It is also about places you should see and people you should meet.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you want to change your life, you must be willing to do two things that are critical. Firstly, change your mind and secondly, discard what does not produce the desired results.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life can change at any time. That is why you need loved ones who can take care of you when things go south.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Change liberates and change elevates. If you want to live a life where you experience the greatest form of grace, live a life where you embrace change.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes change is what you need to do the things you never dared to do—to focus on big dreams and make them real.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In life, not all opportunities will come easily. Some will even seem as if they do not exist. But it is up to you to search for, find, and utilize them while time still allows.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always offer you incredible opportunities to run your race. As you run that race, focus on your lane and not on your neighbours’ if you want to be great.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will present you with good opportunities. Seize them and experience a life of possibilities.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The older you get, the more you realize how short life can be. That is why you need to seize opportunities while they still exist.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “There are endless opportunities in life; do not miss out. Be smart and put yourself to the task of looking them up.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Those who make it in life are those who seize opportunities, not those who are opportunists.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When good opportunities come in your life, it is not time to sit around. It is time to arise and utilize them so you can prosper.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “While it is great to have equal opportunities in life, it is equally important to use those opportunities to make a difference in other people's lives.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “A life of happiness requires you to get rid of any form of bitterness.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Be content with your uniqueness in this world and live a life of happiness.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Be kind, be happy and be wise. Refuse to be anyone’s playground in life. Embrace happiness wherever you are.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you want to live a life of happiness, do not trust those who are full of empty promises.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life happens! Just when you expect happiness, something tragic could happen. So, learn to accept any change of circumstance.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is great when you take charge of your happiness. If it happens that you lose it somewhere, go back and fetch it. Never leave behind your happiness, and never settle for a life of brokenness.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is too short to be unhappy. Disengage from anyone or anything that takes your happiness away.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Never allow sadness to engulf your life. Learn to live a life of happiness.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Play a role in securing happiness in your life and that of others. When you do that, you will experience leaps and bounds of happiness in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No one has their life together, even if they do, it will not be forever. At some point in time, life happens to everyone.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Outstanding people are those who choose to stand up regardless of the setbacks in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Self-mastery is a significant skill for those who want a life of victory.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Some people made it in life not because they attained the highest marks in class but because they chose to make their mark.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes waking up is not easy, but waking up is what makes life easy.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The earth’s surface is not smooth everywhere. Life is just like that; it is full of twists and turns.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The most progressive approach to life is to discuss ideas rather than people.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The noble thing about life is that, in different ways, it treats everyone the same.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The true meaning of life is known by the One who made mankind.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The wisdom to tackle the challenges of life differentiates extraordinary people from ordinary ones.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “There is only one direction in life: forward and not backward.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “There will be times when life seems unfair. But the fortunate thing is that it eventually demonstrates that it can be fair.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “There’s no school of life where one can get certified. Yet it offers the same courses with a different set of tests for each person alive.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Those who stand up and do what is right. Those who shine their light so others can find the right path. Those who make life a little easier with their time, talent and treasure. deserve all the good things in life!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Doubt casts away the possibility of living a purposeful life. Cast it away!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is not too late to turn a new page and write a good story of your life. There is more you can do if you do not keep your purpose out of sight.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life grants each person a unique purpose to accomplish. You are here on earth for a reason; you just need to find it. If you cannot change the world, at least change yourself. Do something to make the world a better place.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is worthwhile when you walk on a path aligned with your purpose.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will grant you the opportunity to pursue your purpose. Be well-informed, seek wisdom and ensure that whatever you do is purpose-aligned.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The gift of life is too precious, do not live your life under the pressure of someone who misdirects you from your purpose.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When you honour the precepts of life, and fulfil your purpose, you will be delighted by its magnificence.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “You can only realize the splendour of life if you are willing to fulfil your purpose while you still have time.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Endeavour to make the right choices in life. It will help you attract the right outcomes.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is what you make of it. It will not always give you what you want, but you can still choose what you want to become.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life offers us an opportunity to live. Choose to live right and be a shining light.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will offer you an opportunity to make choices. You can choose greatness or insignificance, brightness or darkness, happiness or sadness. Whatever you choose, let it be your choice and not somebody else’s.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No matter what life throws your way, choose to be a much better person today than you were yesterday.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Some people come into your life to make it worthwhile, while others come to waste time. Choose the ones worth your while.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Some people will make your life seem like heaven; others will make it seem like hell. Choose to ignore the latter. Life is better when you are surrounded by angels.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Everything rises and falls from mindset. If your mindset is right you will be right. If your mindset is wrong, you will be wrong. Let your mindset be optimistic.”
author: Adeleke Aishat - Tashia

quote: “Be optimistic! You can be the dream.”
author: Adeleke Aishat - Tashia

quote: “Life is like a river. It only moves in one direction—towards the ocean. Your life is also moving in one direction—towards the cemetery. Therefore, prepare enough for a triumphant exit.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is like a tree that provides shade. It is like the rain that waters the plants and the sunrise that makes people smile. It is such an amazing wonder.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is like the vastness of the ocean; it reflects the workmanship of the Creator.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes in life, you need opposers. Like the air pressure that fills up a flat tyre and enables it to perform at its best, such people can help accelerate your growth process if you do not allow them to hinder your success.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “There comes a time in life when beauty has little or no value. That is why you should focus on what is more meaningful—invest in your brains. Do not allow beauty to deceive you; it fades, just like a magnificent building going up in flames.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When nighttime comes, it becomes dark—such is life. There won’t be sunshine all the time, learn to live with that.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When other people’s lives are flourishing but yours is not, do not give up. Not all flowers bloom at the same time. Like a flower that blooms in summer, you will flourish if you persevere during the dry seasons of life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “In this life, we are here for a short while. How we will be remembered after that depends on how we treat others while alive.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life happened as it has, so we could be what we had to be.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life happens so we can become what we need to become.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is given to each one of us. In most cases, we choose how we want to navigate our individual paths.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not about the absence of trials. They will somehow show up even if we did not commit any crime. The presence of trials helps us stand the test of time.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life often finds a way of teaching us something, whether we are willing to learn or unwilling.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will not always be easy, but we can make it easy when we collectively choose to break the existing limits in our society.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes the tears we shed prepare us for the best life we could ever have.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes we are so caught up in the issues of life that we forget the point of departure. We are nothing but voyagers with limited time. We should live each day with a great sense of duty, knowing that one day we will account for this adventure.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The hardships of life can never be avoided completely. We must be ready to deal with whatsoever happens on this journey.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “There will be fewer problems in life if we cease to entrust problematic people with the development of solutions.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “We ought to preserve life with our all. It is a gift that can never be sold at any store.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Anyone can become great in life as long as they stop focusing on what they do not have and build on what they do have until their greatness is manifest.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Every chapter of life does not have to be funny; it does not have to be painful either.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Every human being deserves a better life; it is the inhumane ones who do not mind taking that better life away from others.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Genuine beauty never fades, even when the journey of life ends.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If life was so easy, it would not be worth living. It is the mountains and valleys that make life exciting.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “It is risky not to take calculated risks in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No one has a perfect life; that is the bottom line.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life, unfortunately, does not offer VIP seats to people with a victim mentality. So, you either claim your victory or you continue to be the victim of circumstances.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “When going through hard times, hold on tight until you overcome. With perseverance and God on your side, things will get better. Never give up on yourself, no matter how hard life becomes. One day, you will be fine.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Pray for discernment. It is quite significant because if you cannot discern, you will invite to your table the people meant to cause you torment.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a loan which you will one day have to repay before God. Ensure that the day you repay it, you are met with rapturous applause.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a series of many mysteries. Go out there and make great discoveries. The sweet caress of Mother Nature will help you experience God’s splendour.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Cherish the gift of life that you have been given. Trust that your Creator can do great things through you. Love yourself and be content with the life you have and you will become a magnet that attracts blessings from all corners of the earth.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The journey of life is not always smooth. Pray for the courage to continue, even when things get hard.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Pray for wisdom and discernment so you can know which places to go or avoid, which people to welcome or shun, because being wise can make a big difference in your life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The One who gave you the gift of life knows that you are good enough. Do not ever doubt what you carry on the inside. Live the rest of your life maximizing your potential.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “If you are objective enough to evaluate your journey through life, you will come to the right conclusions about who you are.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a great journey. So, refuse to be idle and never let others drag you where you should not be going.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “On this journey of life, never rely on assumptions; they can lead you to wrong conclusions.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes the journey of life can be hard to comprehend. It is like surfing; the best way to enjoy the waves is to study them, know them and experience them.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes the journey of life will be too hard, but that does not mean you will never overcome.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Sometimes, the journey of life can be difficult, but remember, this is your race to run; no one can do it on your behalf.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The journey of life is not easy, but the difficulties along the way make it interesting to navigate.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The journey of life is travelled by many, but only a few run in their lane because more people focus on what others are doing and where others are going instead of paying more attention to their own destinies.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Every living being is presented with the gift of life. It is up to each one to decide what to do with it while there is still time. Blessed are those who make theirs count.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a precious gift, but not everyone can experience a fulfilling life. If you are fortunate enough to have one, be thankful for that.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Regardless of how you perceive it, life is the greatest gift every human being has ever received. Be cheerful about it, and cherish it.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “No matter where you are, appreciate the gift of life. Find reasons to smile because there comes a time when it becomes impossible to see the sunrise.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “The gift of life must not only be received, it must also be highly prized because it is precious.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is a gift which you will get a chance to unwrap each morning as you wake up. Therefore, be a good recipient of this gift. Use it to make an impact.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “A bee will sting but still make honey. A rose will prick, but have a good scent. Life is like that, there will always be bad and good aspects. Yours is to focus on what is more important.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is like a colouring book. The drawings may be very standard, but you can choose to colour them in a manner that makes them stand out.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is like a garden. Nurture it and plant the right seeds so they can bear good fruits. Do not let anyone plant the wrong seeds in your life because you will harvest them.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is like a glass bowl—very fragile. Please handle it with utmost care because once it breaks, it will still have cracks even after glueing it together.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is quite short, do not cut it short by associating with those who make you feel small.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is short, but one thing is for sure; the life you have is yours, so give it your best shot.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is so good, when you are surrounded by good people.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is surely not a movie, do not live it as though you were acting. Be genuine.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is too short to be whining. Keep dreaming, keep grinding, and keep winning.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is very fragile. Surround yourself with those who exude genuine love!”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is way too short. Cherish the days you have above the surface of the soil, learn to ignore the unsettling noise and use the time you have to do more.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life may not always be pleasant but to find pleasure, you need to appreciate the good and refrain from always complaining about the bad.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life may not always give you what you want, but do not give up on what you want; until you realize you did all that was required.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not as easy as it sounds. It is about sailing troubled waters, navigating unprecedented times, and carving new paths.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life may not always go your way, but you will always feel great when you bring your A-game.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life may not seem fair; but it does give everyone a fair chance.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life rewards those who espouse goodness. Do good even if people are not good to you. You will ultimately feel good and enjoy the goodness of the seeds you planted.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always have its highs and lows. Do not just go with the flow. Learn to bloom, even when you are feeling low.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always present one problem or another. If you cannot solve them, do not be shy about seeking help from others.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always take you through various seasons. Learn to thrive in each season and come out ready to deal with any situation.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always throw different situations at you, no matter who you are or where you are, but there is comfort in knowing those situations do not last forever. So, no matter how hard life gets, you can always bounce back.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always throw in big demands, but you can meet them if you do not give up.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will constantly grant you an opportunity to learn. Use it well.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will always have oceans and forests, mountains and valleys, battles and victories. Let each experience shape you to be a better human.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will not always be easy, but the ups and downs make it amazing.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not always easy, but when you believe, you will find ways to win.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will not present a clear path all the time. Ahead, it may get dark, yet you have to keep moving forward. Do not lose hope when you go through hard times, because eventually, you will find the light.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will offer you a chance to present your gifts to the world. It is up to you to grab that chance or live with regret.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will present you with great things after you have endured some gruesome tests.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will sometimes force you to sail through uncharted waters. Always use to your advantage, such life-changing encounters.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will sometimes require that you partner with others in order to access a larger piece of the pie. As you do that, always avoid those who do not realize that you also deserve good things in life.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life will take you to places you have never been, let you meet people who pull your heartstrings and help you not to lose your rhythm.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life becomes better when you keep these realities in mind. 1. Your days are numbered, 2. You are not better than anyone, and 3. You can’t just live anyhow.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life without a clear vision can be frustrating. Do not jump on the bandwagon of those who do not know where they are going. Seek clarity on what you need to do in order to keep growing.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “We can allow life’s tragedies to make us bitter and resentful, or we can see them as tests of our character and humility, allowing them to make us ever thankful, not only for a life but for this very life—for my life and your life.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Each of us has only one life, unique from every other, and we all have reason to ask, “Why me?”, not in bitterness or despair but in awe and gratitude.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Goals are, by definition, linked to sacrifices. A goal is a focus, and one cannot have a focus without excluding that which is outside that focus.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Your life is one giant, continuous sacrifice being poured out on the altar of your choosing, moment by moment and day by day.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “You’ve been sacrificing your life for your entire life, and you will continue to do so until you have no more life left to sacrifice. Your only choice is what you sacrifice it to.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Success is sweet but to achieve success, it takes strong work ethics, continuous improvement, discipline and determination.”
author: Adeleke Aishat - Tashia

quote: “Passion and talent with right knowledge and consistent practice leads to self fulfilment.”
author: Adeleke Aishat- Tashia

quote: “Figuring out your motivators, values that move and guide you and what inspires you leads you to what you want to be.”
author: Adeleke Aishat- Tashia

quote: “A goal is not the same thing as a wish. A goal is something you work toward; a wish is something you hope will happen to you.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Wisdom is found in nature only by mining a lot of rock.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “What discouraged me most from the goals of my youth were not my failures but my successes, that they proved so hollow.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Worthy goals are always hard.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “If my family is the price of my success, then I am grateful to have had so little of it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Your identity is formed in part by your past, but only in part, and not the most important part. Your past is merely a starting point.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Who are you? You are your aim. You are a seeker of whatever you seek.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Your aim is not just what you train your eye on; it is how you train your eye.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Your aim has the power to turn every good into an evil or every evil into a good. Through it you interpret your past, give purpose to your present, and cast a vision for your future.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Only by making your legacy your aim can you ensure that your essential goals, those that stir from your very essence, remain uncorrupted by a million other, lesser goals that constantly vie for your attention.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Only by making your legacy your aim can you summon the courage to act with conviction in the moment, whatever that moment may bring.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Life is not a series. It has no omnibus. Live it without worrying about the past. Do not relive it. Close your eyes, and mind to what lies behind; so you can focus on the now.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not a show. Do not put up any performances. Just live it, and be willing to grow.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not about competing with others. It is about running your race with courage, and completing it in the right lane.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not about the loud cheers, or the pats on the back. It is about making an impact.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not as easy as it sounds. It is about sailing troubled waters, navigating unprecedented times. and carving new paths.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not black and white. There are many grey areas. That is why you need God to direct your paths.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not easy, but when you put your mind to your vision, and work hard to achieve it, many people will think you have it easy.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is not just about putting your foot on the ground, it is about leaving a trail of footprints that create a long-lasting impact.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is perfect in the pictures, but when you look closely you will notice plenty of imperfections. So even if you are not picture-perfect, never think your life is any less important.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Life is precious, so make it count. Many people on their deathbeds are bargaining for more seconds, minutes, hours, days, years or decades to be alive. Yet, for them it is time to go to the other side. Never waste the time you have now.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Imagine living your life so indelibly that others remember your smile long after they’ve forgotten your name!”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “The alternative to a posture of humble gratitude is one of entitlement, which produces thanklessness toward your own blessings and envy toward the blessings of others.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “It’s not fair!” is the mantra not of the poor and oppressed but of the rich and spoiled. The poor and oppressed of the world don’t pout, “It’s not fair!”—they know the world too well to dare.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “When life is perpetually unfair in your favor, it is tempting to believe that you deserve it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “When everyone we know is a king or a queen, it is easy not to notice each other’s crowns, except when it benefits our self-pity or vanity to compare them.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “You and I enjoy a measure of freedom few have ever known, and it was not our blood that purchased it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Our freedom is not a right we have won but a privilege conferred on us by those who sacrificed much that we might have it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Once we’ve been victimized, none of us can choose not to have been victimized; we can only choose how to respond.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Never indulge your victimization by labeling yourself a victim, regardless of how much you deserve the title.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “When you label yourself a victim, you compel those around you to pay homage to your victimhood. Don’t do that.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “The only one who can give final assent to your victimhood is you.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “To merely survive victimization is to let it consume you still, only bite by bite rather than all at once, to let it loiter in your life and chew at you forever. The only way to truly overcome victimization is to transcend it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Perhaps you are no rock climber, but faced with a big enough rock, you will have to become one.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Be grateful for pain. Don’t ignore it or deny it. Don’t anesthetize yourself from it. Swallow it and make it a part of you.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Only once you can truthfully say you are grateful for your victimization have you transcended it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “There are many injustices that will simply never be made right, and to expect otherwise is to set yourself up to be consumed by frustration.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Justice is a fickle mistress, alluring but elusive, ever delivering less than she promises.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Spend your life chasing justice and only one thing is certain: You will have spent your life.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “To expect a hospitable world is hubris. Instead, expect the opposite. Expect a world that may destroy you at its whim at any moment.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Neither lion nor gazelle question whether it is just for the lion to catch and eat the gazelle or just for the gazelle to get away and let the lion starve.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Justice is the delusion of the self-entitled. To desire it is to desire a world that is not this world.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Whatever your world is, you are alive, and an incomprehensible number of things had to happen just the way they did for that to be the case.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “You may be appalled by your world, but you must be gratefully appalled.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Your life has come at the expense of a nearly infinite number of other potential lives that will now never get to be lived because you get to live.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “You have but one life. You could spend it taking stock of what others have and resenting it, or you could spend it taking stock of what you have and doing something with it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Categorizing yourself by either your victimization or your privilege fails to give any clarity to life’s fundamental question: What are you going to do with it?”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Wallowing in victimhood only demeans and paralyzes you. Don’t do it. Redeem it instead. Transcend it instead.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “A woman in labor never asks, “Why me?” because she knows both the cause of her suffering and its effect, and that sense of reason and purpose gives her the capacity to endure it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “What right do I have to the blessings I’ve received? None. They are not a right—they are a gift.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “It is only when you can admit you may be wrong and are willing to grapple with uncomfortable ideas that you stand to grow.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Burn so bright, that the haters go blind.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Being a leader is not easy. It's a delicate balance between humility and self-confidence. It takes immense courage to lead others but also requires an honest awareness of our own limitations.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “It's easy to sit on the sidelines and analyze different strategies, but true growth comes from taking action.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Courage is the key that unlocks the door to new possibilities.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Indecision breeds doubt, but decisive action fuels confidence.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Focus on what really matters and watch as the fog clears. Opportunities will appear where you least expect them.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Embrace the unknown, take bold steps forward, and discover the limitless potential that lies within you.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Will power can do anything which can't be done by any power.”
author: P k

quote: “You have to changed, before you will replace.”
author: P k

quote: “The reason you’ve been dragging your feet for so many years is most likely because your motivation to change is far less than the powerful force of inertia which is probably due to the comfort zone.”
author: Binod Shankar

quote: “Don't care about ,who laugh on you.. Care about those who caring about you..”
author: P k

quote: “Don't copy.. Make your copyright..”
author: P k

quote: “Don't feel sad if you don't get which you expected.. Because either it's not yours or its not over..”
author: P k

quote: “Boost your productivity by focusing on the tasks that truly matter, working with intentionality and purpose, and continuously seeking new ways to optimize your workflow.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Streamlining decision-making is not about sacrificing quality for speed, but rather finding a balance between thoughtful analysis and timely action to drive progress and success.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Aligning your goals with your lifestyle is the foundation for living a life that feels both intentional and fulfilling.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Never quit on yourself.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Ain't there nothing sapiens can't do,Ain't no mountain sapiens can't climb.Ain't no darkness sapiens can't conquer,Ain't no division sapiens can't undivide.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “When living an unbullshitafied life, you tend to attract the strong and offend the weak. Just do your thing.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Time spent under a burden is often time well spent.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Unspoken lessons are easily missed or misunderstood, and help unoffered is its own imposition.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “When answering life's big questions, it doesn’t even matter what you say your answers are; what matters is what you do.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “We will all be average in some things, above average in others, and below average in still others. But to aspire to be average is another thing entirely.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “My best teachers showed me respect by refusing to share in my low expectations.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “What drives a teacher is never what lies behind. At the heart of teaching is hope, and hope looks forward.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “A teacher casts his work into the wind, knowing not where it will be blown, in hopes that a seed will land somewhere it can take root and outlive the one who cast it.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “The first thing we are given, life itself, is the privilege of all privileges. Whatever else life brings us, having it at all should fill us with humility and gratitude.”
author: Shawn Davis

quote: “Our very definition and understanding of the Comfort Zone is false—or at the very least, incomplete. True, lasting success is not attained outside our Comfort Zone, but rather inside it.”
author: Kristen Butler

quote: “It's true that life is short and time is fleeting, but if you can stop to appreciate how precious it is, you'll find that time is the most precious measure of true wealth!”

quote: “Discipline may be a tricky but at the end of the day, it's believing that you can achieve your goals and dreams that will get you closer to them.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “The more important a call to action is to our purpose, the more we may be tempted to resist it - and yet it may just be what opens up new doors and opportunities for us.”

quote: “Don't let fear or doubt stop you from trusting the process! Commit to your goals and trust that everything will turn out just fine.”

quote: “Give me a library and a good book and we will be friends for life.”

quote: “we all are puppets under someone's control”

quote: “Dreaming is the fuel in the car of dedication!”

quote: “Writing is pain relief, or at least pain management.”

quote: “Step forward in faith, rather living in pray & hope.”

quote: “Destructive habits are not flaws; they’re coping mechanisms that serve a purpose. They’re survival tactics we deploy to shield us from stress, sadness, fear, grief, and frustration.”

quote: “Sometimes the fries are the best choice by a mile, but sometimes an apple with almond butter is paradise on a plate. If you can’t tell the difference, you aren’t quite listening—yet.”

quote: “It feels awfully nice to be a little kinder to yourself and everybody else.”

quote: “Time is the most frequent obstacle to change that my clients name. Luckily, it comes in small increments. It can be broken down and taken back in pocket-sized, clever little nuggets: one minute, five minutes, fifteen minutes at a time.”

quote: “The linchpin for successful change is in the reward. The reward for a new routine has to be pleasurable, and it has to be quick. If the payoff takes too long to arrive or doesn’t feel good, odds are you won’t stick with it.”

quote: “We don’t know what we will see and where we’ll reach once we begin to think, once we begin to dream.”

quote: “Nature's serene beauty and tranquillity aid in one's search.”

quote: “Make yourself the light in the darkness”

quote: “Take a deep dive into nature. You will see everything around you colourful.”

quote: “Whether you're facing a challenge or celebrating the little victories in life, know that nothing is more courageous than owning and loving your story.”

quote: “Don't let anyone tell you otherwise: your potential is LimitLESS! Stop doubting your potential. Work hard, take small steps and make your dreams a reality.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “If you want to have long-term success as a coach or in any role of leadership, having an obsession with your craft is essential.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Life is full of unexpected turns and challenges, but don't let that stop you from becoming who you are truly meant to be. Push through any doubts or fears and unlock your hidden potential.”

quote: “Life isn't about getting the perfect hand of cards - it's about taking the cards you're dealt and making the most of them!”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Leadership is not about having the most power or authority. It’s about having the courage and drive to turn ideas into action.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Leadership is not about having the most power or authority, it’s about having the courage and drive to turn ideas into action.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Take risks, make bold decisions, and enjoy the journey of leaving your own unique mark in this world.”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “Don't let anything stop you from exploring what lies ahead and making a lasting impact that none of us could have predicted!”
author: Felecia Etienne

quote: “When it comes to success, it’s not just what you do and how hard you work - it's also about taking care of yourself!”

quote: “Real courage lies in being able to believe in yourself enough to try again tomorrow, even after a tough day.”

quote: “Identifying your core values and goals is an incredibly important step on the road to achieving success.”

quote: “Be proud of the work you are skilled at because no task is small and no job isn’t enough, every seed sown is a blessing for each one of us.”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Predicting the future isn’t what you should focus on, hard work is where your concentration should lie, your future will be built even if you don’t judge.”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Courageous decisions make the best entrepreneurs, its all about when you decide to start!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Build an empire and make it a brand.”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Secrecy is the best way to show people your results!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Don't worry about being slow, we all fasten up with Confidence!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Start from scratch grow with cash!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “A well-planned day makes you a better focused entrepreneur with a greater vision.”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Sell what others can't! Always remember... UNIQUENESS IS VALUED!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Plan your dream but focus on your goals!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “The ultimate stimulation is being underestimated and then over exceeding expectations!”

quote: “Connectivity is the key to grow your opportunities.”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Deliver what others never expected and watch how you climb the ladder of success faster...”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “Become a legacy by building your own empire but don’t forget to thank everyone who was part of your success!”
author: RJ Yolande Mendes

quote: “With your brain veritably defined by its dynamic neuroplasticity, the cage that holds you back is an illusion. Your brain potential is unlimited.”

quote: “The people who would disrespect you without knowing you are not the kind of people whose respect means anything.”
author: L. Spurlo

quote: “Immerse yourself in the world or the industry that you wish to master.”
author: Robert Greene

quote: “You'll never get from where you are to where you want to be if you keep your focus on the fact that you are not there yet. See it the way you desire and feel it ‛‛as if’’ it is happening.”

quote: “You deserve to create what’s in you to create.”
author: Keiko O'Leary

quote: “The rhythm of moving through the mountains has a way of wearing away the rough edges of the ego.”

quote: “Pain is growth.”
author: Tommy Caldwell

quote: “Fear in its role as a protector is good when you have someone waiting at home and you don't want their lives disrupted because of your own adventurous spirit ..”

quote: “Nature makes no distinction between creating and destroying life.”

quote: “The cyclone ends. The sun returns; the lofty coconut trees lift up their plumes again; man does likewise. The great anguish is over; joy has returned; the sea smiles like a child.”

quote: “Love is eternal; the aspect may change,but not the essence.”

quote: “Life is a journey...a yearning for love.”
author: Shree Shambav

author: Shree Shambav

author: Shree Shambav

author: Shree Shambav

quote: “In my world, women’s motivation change.”

author: Shree Shambav

quote: “It is never too late to ask yourself, ‘Am I ready to make a life change?’ Is it possible for me to change from within?”
author: Shree Shambav

quote: “I find it terrifying how so many people are prepared to spend so much on motivation and inspiration, yet spend so little on education and information.”
author: loren weisman

quote: “One should be revitalized and reborn at every beat and with each new breath.”

quote: “Everything that you look at, even the things you like, or the people that you disdain or abhor, exists in you to varying degrees.”

quote: “Life crashes like waves against the shore of my heart. Your love has become the safe harbor from which my soul can never depart”

quote: “If you have a dream, don't let it go unfulfilled. Gather the courage to believe in your ability to succeed, and make the necessary plans to make it a reality." – Shree Shambav”

quote: “As I stood there watching the mists softly rise, I wondered what vista could be more beautiful than this. The dense mist obscured visibility at times. The wind howled and roared as it swept through." - Shree Shambav”
author: Shree Shambav

quote: “Happiness cannot be the goal because you already have it”

quote: “You can do everything, this is not useful for you. if you don't believe it”

quote: “If you want to know the power of an idea just know, that it can change your whole life”
author: Vishesh Panthi

quote: “The biggest problem is thinking about the problem and thinking about the solution the greatest solution”

quote: “She needed the stimulus of an occupation which would take her out of herself.”

quote: “Let "them" sleep on you. Just make sure YOU never do. You are your own muse.”

quote: “Go so fast you leave fear behind”

quote: “The Cause that caused Fear need not appear again. Therefore not fear about Fear”

quote: “The mystery of life is in this moment.”

quote: “To pray to seek to be in God's presence.”

quote: “A man on fire is a man of faith.”

quote: “Little things don't make perfection but perfection is made out of little things.”

quote: “If you can't help your self, God can help you, if you call on him, so that eventually you be able to do what must be done.”

quote: “. Many great things await you in the future, and with your wisdom life will be a game you skillfully manoeuvre.”

quote: “You are a gift to humanity and meant to be shared with the world, dim your light; no more, and allow your wings to soar.”

quote: “stay focused on your desires, knowing that you will make it happen so long as you never give up; victory shall be your cup.”
author: Thabiso Makekele

author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: “Common sense is more important than rights.”

quote: “When you get too free, they kill you because you are getting too close to the truth. (Remember and never forget, The Gun Line BOSS) in my Eddie Murphy voice”

quote: “Drama free workplace and ego free team mates are crucial for a healthier workplace”

quote: “Executing ideas is as simple as taking the first step.”

quote: “Do Not let the crumbling of the dying Old World weigh down your Heart; For We Are here, To Create the New.”

quote: “The greatest winners were once losers”

quote: “Only believe, you shall behold.”

quote: “The wood is not the fuel. The cold is the fuel. For the cold creates the passion for the fire.”

quote: “Those who don't do, bark. Those who are humans, do.”

quote: “It is better to say No instead of pretending to have all the answers.”

quote: “Those who don't lift, laugh. Those who are humans, lift.”

quote: “Even the mountains bow, but not for self-absorbed snobs. Oceans part making way, only for those not afraid of storms.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

author: Fiersa Besari

quote: “You have to be careful when having fun because what is fun to you may not be fun to someone else.”

quote: “What is fun to you may not be fun to someone else.”
author: Robbie J. Farha

quote: “People who are motivated away from things often experience a lot of pain and worry before they’re motivated to act.”

quote: “Embrace your greatness”
author: Andrew Snorton

quote: “I’ve lost heart more times than I can count. But God has always helped me find it one more time than I can count.”

quote: “The greatest test you will ever face is mastering yourself.”

quote: “Motivation doesn't work unless your determination is up to the mark”

quote: “It takes courage to be a champion.”

quote: “If you have to hurt other people in order to feel powerful, you are an extremely weak individual.— Bobby J Mattingly”

quote: “If you have to hurt other people in order to feel powerful, you are an extremely weak individual.”
author: Bobby J Mattingly

quote: “Healthy can be unhealthy too.”
author: Robbie J. Farha

quote: “Rock bottom can be our greatest teacher - as long as we don't stay there for too long.”

quote: “I believe, with all my heart, that anyone can improve and create a life they love from where they are right now.”

quote: “Don't wait on anyone to tell you what you are worth. You have to be the first person who knows what you are worth and who can say what you are worth.”

quote: “For once in your life be a total idiot, for the right cause, for there is no righter cause than the cause of humanity.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “The power of the brain is stronger than the pain”

quote: “The world isn’t changed by people who are ready.”
author: Richie Norton

quote: “You are the ink, pen and paper, your life is your own decision.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.”
author: Harry Golden

quote: “A word builds a sentence, which builds a paragraph, which builds a page, which builds a chapter, which builds a book. Build with intent.”
author: Keith M. Murley

quote: “Conquer yourself before you go out to conquer the world.”
author: Aiyaz Uddin

quote: “I never consider my team just customer service representatives, rather service excellence providers. Anyone can serve customers, however my team is next level as provides excellence in service to customers.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Fall, fall and fall again, to fall without stopping is rising.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Competitions are for horses, not heroes.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Leading from the front is cliché. I lead from the back to push you forward or be there to catch you. I lead from the side because Im your ally and here to serve you. Leaders are accessible at all times.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Should our motivation to achieve be just for the sake of the achievement itself with no thought of who/what we become in the process?If we want to sincerely enjoy our lives, who we become along the way is far more important than what we achieve.”
author: Richie Norton

quote: “Mind is the sentient seed of all time and tide, yet we hide like roaches behind fate's fake hide.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Mountains bow when you start climbing, oceans dry when you start crossing. Awake, arise and boldly march forward, the path appears when you start walking.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Your approach is to attempt everything & believe in nothing; the world/Market situations are changing so rapidly that if you want to succeed you cannot afford to align yourself with a default approach or point of view.”
author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quote: “No time? If you do one thing a day, you will have done thirty things in a month.”
author: Deryn van der Tang

quote: “I don’t work. I write - Niedria Kenny”
author: Niedria Kenny

quote: “Intelligence is knowing the what's and the how's. Wisdom is knowing when and where to use it. Humility is knowing the who and why.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Excellence doesn't just happen. Its a practise.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Do not apologize for having standards”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Saying someone is lost is as crazy as saying there is somewhere they are supposed to be.”
author: Brian Gahan

quote: “Organisations always want input with creativity and innovation but often have hierarchical control in place.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “As Freud said, if you don’t pay you don’t get better.”
author: Rick Roderick

quote: “Bersabar bukan hanya sebatas bertahan dalam segala rintangan. Sabar adalah tidak berbuat zalim meski mampu melakukannya.”
author: Sibel Eraslan

quote: “We don't learn from our experiences, we learn from reflecting on our experiences.”
author: Robbie J. Farha

quote: “A great world is only as far away as our willingness to make it great.”
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: “Whatever happens in your life, please stay alive. I believe you can do it. Don't ever give up.”
author: Moona Hoshinova

quote: “Always remember that you already have power over those who try to have power over you.”
author: Robbie J. Farha

quote: “Your dreams are free but the hustle is sold separately.”
author: Vic Stah Milien

quote: “An idea upon which attention is peculiarly concentrated is an idea which tends to realize itself.”
author: Charles Baudouin

quote: “I’m closing the chapters on the me that I used to be and I’m opening the pages to the person I should have become a long time ago.”
author: Ravenwolf

quote: “Change is inevitable, but evolution is optional ... So, I chose to evolve. What are you choosing?”
author: Ravenwolf

quote: “She wasn’t a one in a million woman, she was a once in a lifetime lady.”
author: Ravenwolf

quote: “Well being is a great wealth.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “You can advance only by being larger than your present place; and no man is larger than his present place who leaves undone any of the work pertaining to that place.”
author: Wallace D. Wattles

quote: “The world is advanced only by those who more than fill their present places.”
author: Wallace D. Wattles

quote: “Don't cry for everythingJust try for something”
author: Sai Teja Thumuluru

quote: “So, we hide, and we fight, and we hide, and we train, and we fight.”
author: Jennifer West

quote: “A wise person keeps the faith and remains hopeful despite the dissemination of stupidity that surrounds them.”
author: Lisa Young-Sutton

quote: “Like snails, humans are born small but sturdy. While we are shaped by our circumstances, our essence—temperament, traits, and talents—remain with us as we age. Over time, our spirit and strength grow with us like a snail’s shell.”
author: Sabrina Moyle

quote: “Businesses have to stop thinking like a companies or corporations, we have to start thinking like customers. People is always the purpose for our business”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “People over profit always.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Never underestimate the impact of customer service. Every business has customers that needs to be served.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “To ‘give up’ on the idea of ‘giving up’ is the first step in ‘getting up.”
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: “When you become a child with a child, you forget everything; That is the real state of happiness”
author: Jignesh Ahalgama

quote: “It's one thing to get called into creation without being asked first,But it's an insult to injury to then be expected on top of that to work out what the hell you're doing here in the first (second) place”
