quote: “A quote equals a good book”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “You didn’t lose your power; you GAVE it away. It won’t come back on its own; you must TAKE it back!”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Criticism and hate will always boost your confidence to achieve your goals”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “Your failures are your assets, make sure you remember it when you fail and especially when you are trying to succeed”
author: Anuj Jasani

quote: “When disaster strikes, be open to a solution.”
author: Vince Poscente

quote: “The darkness of the night does not mean that there is no sun in this universe; Sadness does not mean that there is no happiness in your life: Just change the perspective, everything will change.”
author: Jignesh Ahalgama

quote: “The empty glass is filled with air; Just change the perspective, everything will change.”
author: Jignesh Ahalgama

quote: “As a service excellence provider, I always think about how to turn a customer's pain point into brownie points. Never underestimate the power of any customer transaction”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Look, knowing is overrated. When we assume we know something, we don’t venture any further, dig deeper, or ask questions. When we’re married to ‘knowing,’ we overlook curiosity. Curiosity is where it’s at!”
author: Karen Joy Hardwick

quote: “Of course there are limits. Every mountain has a peak. The beauty of this life is that there are many mountains to climb and new limits to reach.”
author: Nate Hamon

quote: “Get Inspired, Be inspiring”
author: Dido Stargaze

quote: “It is always easier to blame Satan for our own deeds.”
author: Rodrigue Rizk

quote: “Till our next generations are not taught about the price paid by our ancestors to retain our identity, the will wind up choosing wrong Heroes.”
author: Sandeep Sahajpal

quote: “Everything that matters rests on the realization that this life is an inside job”
author: Karen Joy Hardwick

quote: “Listening to others can be hard. It is even harder if we don’t learn to listen to ourselves”
author: Karen Joy Hardwick

quote: “It takes a whole life to switch from imagination to visualization!”
author: Leena Duwadi

quote: “Where there's a will there are ten thousand ways”
author: Shawn Stevenson

quote: “The sense of greatness, the sense of education, the sense that we can always figure it out, find a way to overcome almost anything through learning and education”
author: Shawn Stevenson

quote: “Until a child that has issues with learning is diagnosed by "an expert" as having a learning disability, nothing is wrong with that child except that his motivation and feelings about the said "learning" is inadequate.”
author: Asuni LadyZeal

quote: “Motivating your team is like cooking. You need to select and blend the right quality ingredients and serve them fresh as often as you can; otherwise, your team will get hungry and grumpy.”
author: Cristina Imre

quote: “Go-getters don't know the term "couldn't".”
author: Kaniskar

quote: “Be a go-getter.”
author: Kaniskar

quote: “If we don't wind down, we'll never truly wake up.”
author: Tiffany Shlain

quote: “The downs in life only make you appreciate the ups much more.”
author: The Britiannic Scribian

quote: “No Matter How Worst Your Life Is Passing,Always Remember,The Living You Have Today Is Already Some People's Dream.”
author: Ravevx

quote: “Maybe the worst reason to do anything. I got scared.”
author: Vincent H. O'Neil

quote: “I love travelling to places far from civilization. I always feel more civilized when I return.”
author: Furiosa

quote: “When in phase of uncertainty, befriend yourself to a new discovery”
author: Garry James

quote: “I find that those who have the most to lose are the most motivated”
author: Brothers Grimm

quote: “I will not wait for later or the ‘right time’. There is only this time and I am ready to live in it.”
author: Molly Remer

quote: “Don't wait for the right moment. Just get started and learn along the way.”
author: Garima Soni - words world

quote: “Don't try to change, be the changeDon't try to be good, be goodDon't try to be a Buddha, be a BuddhaDon't try to be successful, behave successfully”
author: Dido Stargaze

quote: “Life is but an experiment of trial and error, instead of fretting the future, cherish the experiment.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Always try to avoid looking backward and forward if you want to be upward.”
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: “When I want to do a thing I always can do it.”
author: Brothers Grimm

quote: “The grave tragedies we’ve experienced can help motivate us to unite for a better world.”
author: Donna Maltz

quote: “Wealth can be created, but time cannot. The wealth you create is contingent on the time you put in. So, use all your time.”
author: Daniel Idfresne

quote: “There's only one person better than you, and you see them in the mirror every single day. Never stop being you.”
author: Hissam Effendi

quote: “If you are tired of doing the work.You are tired of winning.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “You aren't able to manifest what you are not doing or becoming.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Meditation is good for sound mind.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “A growth mindset or a fixed mindset is a function of a person's motivation. A person's motivation shapes what and how he thinks, which in turn tells on his mindset.”
author: Asuni LadyZeal

quote: “If you want to go forward, You must take action and apply yourself”
author: Osman Gulum

quote: “Don't doubt your dreams.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Purposefully pursue your dreams with all diligence.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Anxiety is never your fault. Neither is it an innate part of who you are. Change is possible.”
author: Chloe Brotheridge

quote: “There are four types of motivational forces: fear, dreams and desires, fulfilling big ideas, and transforming the world to make a better place to live. The fear and security, driven motivational forces are in the lowest level.”
author: Amit Ray

quote: “Human- A Peculiar animal, constantly in a race to prove something; which it’s not.”
author: Ansh - The Mystic Rider

quote: “Those who are chagrined by their predicaments are incognisant of their higher motivations.”
author: Mecha Constantine

quote: “Spite is a perfectly good motivation.”
author: T. Raine

quote: “Failure and rejections are just words. It is your choice to go ahead and be a champion or to just cry whole life.”
author: Manjithe Senanayake

quote: “Connection gives us the grace and grit to unleash our potential and endure the challenge of our daily mess.”
author: Karen Joy Hardwick

quote: “To merge on the road you are meant to travel, means making a choice and then taking action.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “The elements of the written word can be purely magical. I read and I write...I inspire and I’m living.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “Inspiration ignites the spark of magic. Creativity is magic.”
author: C. Toni Graham

quote: “A good Athlete may not be a good Coach, likewise, a good Coach may not be a good Athlete”
author: Dido Stargaze

quote: “Gravity is the God and the Sun is the Son of God as our ancestors tried to teach us, they were scientists with unstoppable creativity”
author: Dido Stargaze

quote: “Have no room for people who set you back.”
author: Janna cachola

quote: “Faith is a full surrender to the Supreme Being.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Sometimes what others say about us matters the most.”
author: Anthony Ejefoh

quote: “Strong, vibrant, positive company culture values their people so greatly that no one feels like just a number.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “Spiritually healthy employees are the greatest asset and partners an organization can have. They are positive, solution-seeking, and unifying people.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “Great leaders understand that it is impossible to compartmentalize elements of life, so they create opportunities for people to grow in every area.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “The ‘purpose’ element of onboarding is where you begin to lay the foundation of success for your new team member.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “People are the lifeblood of any business.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “Believing you can’t find good people is like saying you can’t grow your business.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “Culture has the single greatest impact on your bottom line.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “A strong, positive culture holds us accountable for taking responsibility and finding solutions.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “Leader, you have to know your why, for yourself and your business.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “The magic to recruiting is going to where the people are, and the people are living on social media.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “You want your people recruiting, especially your highest performers.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “This is about designing a culture that is so strong and healthy, your team can’t stay quiet about their experience.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “There is an art to developing people.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “The people within your leadership are a direct reflection of you.”
author: Mitch Gray

quote: “Behaviour is your character in action”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Hard work does not pay off. Your discipline does.Working hard ones is not enough. Work hard as a habit.”
author: Janna cachola

quote: “As a leader, my job as a CEO is Culture + Excellence Officer. My team are proffessionals, they know their job. I just maintain culture and drive excellence.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Magic will happen, Just distance yourself from negativity.”
author: Brajesh Kumar Singh

quote: “When you have done your homework and hard work then let God work on you so you become successful.”
author: Aiyaz Uddin

quote: “Difficulties only add value to a dream.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “If you get tired, learn to rest not quit.”
author: Garima Soni
